name: Arid (itch)
description:
Arid is an interactive experience built around the song "Arid".  Arid (the song) Is built on several layers of audio each adding to the  experience. Collect all the layers to experience the complete audio/interactive experience.

This interactive experience was created for a University project by the following people: Troy Rogerson, Daniel Buckley, Shaun Graham, Crystal Nugent, Carter Kraaijmaat.

Audio: Carter Kraaijmaat

Programming: Troy Rogerson

Art / Models /Effects: Crystal Nugent, Shaun Graham
